DOC.brief_summary: This cross-over intervention study aim investigate effect two dos thylakoids oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) glucose insulin homeostasis well appetite regulate hormone healthy volunteer .
DOC.detailed_description: A minimum twenty healthy volunteer recruit participate OGTT three different occasion separate one week . At two occasion green leaf extract , thylakoids , add glucose solution ; 5 gram 10 gram randomize order . The third occasion , without added thylakoids , serve control . Blood sample take fast 15 , 30 , 45 , 60 , 90 , 120 180 minute glucose load . Blood sample analyse p-glucose , p-insulin , p-C-peptide , p-ghrelin , p-CCK p-GLP-1 .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Adult Normalweight weight stable Not pregnant breastfeed No use medication affect glucose insulin homeostasis ( example corticosteroid ) . Diabetes , Impaired glucose tolerance and/or insulin resistance Anaemia Use tobacco drug .
